document_data.name: Mass Reduce Person
document_data.refs3e: {{Cite dragon/318/Oriental Adventures Update|41}}{{Cite dragon/323/Seven Deadly Domains|64}}
document_data.mainbody: '''''Mass reduce person''''' was a [[spell]] that made the targets small.
document_data.Effects: The targets, which needed to be [[humanoid]]s, became small. Their dimensions all halved in size, as did their equipment. This allowed them to become more agile at the cost of growing physically weaker.
document_data.Components: The spell only required somatic, verbal, and material components. The needed material component was a pinch of powdered [[iron]].
